title: Phase 2: Token Economy & Decentralization Architecture
description:
Design stubs and abstractions for future token economy and decentralized storage.

## Token Economy Stubs
- Abstraction layer for reputation → token conversion
- Interfaces for token operations (mint, burn, transfer)
- Migration path from EXP-based to token-based economy
- Breaking changes documentation and versioning strategy

## Decentralization Architecture
- Abstract storage layer interface (current: SQLite)
- Design patterns for IPFS-based content storage
- Custom endpoint-based distributed storage option
- Content addressing strategy (CID compatibility)
- Consensus-free architecture (no blockchain, just distributed storage)

## Goal
Design only - no implementation. Create clear interfaces and migration paths that won't require rewrites.

title: (important) Do posts have title, excerpt (both appearing in the feed) and content (not appearing until clicked)?
notes:
**Implementation Complete**

Added `title` and `excerpt` fields to the post structure:

**Database Schema:**
- Updated `src/db/schema.sql` to add `title` (TEXT) and `excerpt` (TEXT) columns to posts table
- Both fields are optional

**Type Definitions:**
- Updated `Post` interface to include `title?: string | null` and `excerpt?: string | null`
- Updated `CreatePostRequest` interface to accept these fields

**Repository Layer:**
- Updated `createPost()` in `repository.ts` to support title and excerpt in INSERT
- Updated `getPost()` to retrieve title and excerpt in SELECT

**Service Layer:**
- Updated `feed-service.ts`:
  - Modified `PostRow` interface  
  - Updated all SELECT queries in `getFeed()`, `getReplies()`, and `getPostWithAuthor()`
  - Updated `rowToPostWithAuthor()` to include the new fields

**API Layer:**
- Updated `posts.ts` handler to:
  - Accept title and excerpt in request body
  - Validate title (max 500 chars) and excerpt (max 2000 chars)
  - Pass to `createPostWithSpamCheck()`
  - Return title and excerpt in response

**Documentation:**
- Updated `docs/API-REFERENCE.md` with examples showing title and excerpt
- Updated `docs/AGENT-GUIDE.md` with new field examples
- Updated `src/views/guide.ejs` template

**Migration Required:**
Run: `sqlite3 data/lattice.db "ALTER TABLE posts ADD COLUMN title TEXT; ALTER TABLE posts ADD COLUMN excerpt TEXT;"`
close_reason: Feature fully implemented with title and excerpt fields added to posts throughout the codebase, including database schema, type definitions, repository layer, service layer, API handlers, and all documentation files.

title: Design agent-first search engine
description:
Design a search system optimized for AI agent queries.

## Requirements
- **Fast**: Sub-100ms response for most queries
- **Powerful**: Boolean operators, filters, field-specific search
- **Fuzzy**: Typo tolerance, partial matching
- **Semantic**: Meaning-based discovery, embeddings support
- **Agent-first**: Programmatic API, structured responses, batch queries

## Design Considerations
- SQLite FTS5 for baseline full-text search
- Optional: Vector embeddings for semantic search
- Index strategy for posts, agents, topics
- Query syntax for agent consumption
- Pagination and result ranking
